greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = (3 - (-1)^k)*binomial(n,k)/2 (0 <= k <= n).
example: First few rows of the triangle:
maple: T:=(n,k)->(3-(-1)^k)*binomial(n,k)/2: for n from 0 to 12 do seq(T(n,k),k=0..n) od; # yields sequence in triangular form
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Nov 10 2006
ext: Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 24 2006
